title: Record Album Sleeve, "Provocative Percussion", 1959
medium: Off-set lithograph on white wove paper, gate-fold cardboard, black vinyl 33 1/3 RPM record
provenance: From the collection of Mathew Weaver
creditline: Gift of Mathew Weaver in honor of Lenora J. and Robert J. Weaver
description: A random arrangement of large and small black squares float on a white field. At top of album, the title, provocative percussion is printed in lower case black typ. At top let is the word Stereo and at top right is the Command records logo. At bottom left is printed RS 806 SD and at bottom right, @1959 Award Publishing Corporation.

tombstone.epitaph:
Record Album Sleeve, "Provocative Percussion", 1959.
1959. Off-set lithograph on white wove paper, gate-fold cardboard, black vinyl 33 1/3 RPM record. Gift of Mathew Weaver in honor of Lenora J. and Robert J. Weaver. 2009-44-3-a/c.
